text:
Message 368 of 4024
Good Morning Christine-
I hope this finds you well. Our custody plans had me seeing Adrian today until tonight at 8:30. Then you had him Sunday for ski, returning him for
an overnight on Sunday. I planned to see if Max would join at some point for MLK day to see the new place and have a family dinner. I would have all
kids back by 8:30 PM on Monday. I hope that our plan still applies. Please do let me know so I can prepare and we can do the exchange in a way that
affords you comfort and an assurance of safety.
Best Regards,
robert
Sent:01/13/2024 at 11:06 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 11:10 AM)
Subject:Kids this Weekend
Message 369 of 4024
Hi Robert,
Given the recent events, I am not going to move forward with what you outlined below or the temp plan we had worked on with Dr. Brown.
What you did to myself and boys is serious with
Immediate consequences.
Our lawyers are in communication and are negotiating next steps.
Your message below shows a complete lack of understanding of the seriousness of the situation and impact on the children and myself.
Christine
Sent:01/13/2024 at 11:16 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 11:25 AM)
Subject:Re: Kids this Weekend
Message 370 of 4024
Do you want to arrange for a Lugg pick from Kirkland place today to your residence? I will be home between now and 6pm so anytime then to assist
the lugg people. I do not want you assisting in this end.
It wonâ€™t be everything but I have a good start on items that can go over.
Big items are peloton, your bike, inversion, grill, green egg. Let me know if anything else.
I have gathered clothes, ski gear, some electronics, art, decor, miscellaneous household items in front room so it should be an easy load up.
Sent:01/13/2024 at 12:09 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/13/2024 at 12:13 PM)
Subject:Lugg today
